title: Ushiro no Bishojo ga, Boku wo Tsukande Hanasanai - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Supernatural
author: Ogasawara Yukito   小笠原　雪兎（ゆきと）
description:
In the first grade of Highschool, Yuzu, the protagonist of this series who failed to make friends since the start of the school ceremony. And within a week since then, the pretty girl who seated behind Yuzu is started to mind about him. The girl’s name is Ayaka.

Ayaka has an impression of 『Calm』 but, her true nature is a mischievous child. Actually, she is an esper. Ayaka is by using her esper power, she read Yuzu’s mind in order to tease Yuzu. She is doing this to having contact with him.

While she always said 『Yuu’s whereabouts is just beside me 』 to Yuzu. But, actually, she means 『Don’t go anywhere. Don’t leave me alone 』 said a coward.

There is also trauma from being an esper, the lonely Ayaka hates if Yuzu is begone from her side. That’s why she caught Yuzu and not letting him go as she hates becoming alone. Because Yuzu is the only one who can accept herself.

To always beside him, to make him a lunch box every day, to form a pair together during PE, coming home together…

To make fun of Yuzu while having the upper hand… and sometimes, reversely to being made fun of, Ayaka is enjoyed her daily life with Yuzu.

Yuzu is not the only one that gets caught by Ayaka, his heart is also get caught before he realized it. And, just like that, he is dragged into Ayaka. At a certain part of his heart, love begins sprouting and gradually growing...>
